```mjs
      d="M16.5 11L13 7.5l1.4-1.4l2.1 2.1L20.7 4l1.4 1.4l-5.6 5.6M11 7H2v2h9V7m10 6.4L19.6 12L17 14.6L14.4 12L13 13.4l2.6 2.6l-2.6 2.6l1.4 1.4l2.6-2.6l2.6 2.6l1.4-1.4l-2.6-2.6l2.6-2.6M11 15H2v2h9v-2z"
      fill="currentColor"
    />
  </svg>
)`,
}

// æ”¶é›†æ‰€æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶
function getAllFiles(dir, ext = '.tsx') {
  const files = []
  const items = readdirSync(dir)

  for (const item of items) {
    const fullPath = join(dir, item)
    const stat = statSync(fullPath)

    if (stat.isDirectory() && !item.startsWith('.') && item !== 'node_modules') {
      files.push(...getAllFiles(fullPath, ext))
    } else if (item.endsWith(ext) || item.endsWith('.ts') || item.endsWith('.vue')) {
      files.push(fullPath)
    }
  }

  return files
}

// è§£æå¯¼å…¥è¯­å¥
function parseImportLine(line) {
  // åŒ¹é… import { X, Y as Z } from '~/components/icons'
  const match = line.match(/import\s*\{([^}]+)\}\s*from\s*['"]~\/components\/icons['"]/)
  if (!match) return null

  const imports = match[1].split(',').map((s) => s.trim()).filter(Boolean)
  const result = []

  for (const imp of imports) {
    // å¤„ç† as é‡å‘½å
    const asMatch = imp.match(/^(\w+)\s+as\s+(\w+)$/)
    if (asMatch) {
      result.push({ original: asMatch[1], alias: asMatch[2] })
    } else {
      result.push({ original: imp, alias: null })
    }
  }

  return result
}

// å¤„ç†å•ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶
function processFile(filePath) {
  const content = readFileSync(filePath, 'utf-8')
  const lines = content.split('\n')

  let hasIconImport = false
  let importLineStart = -1
  let importLineEnd = -1
  let importedIcons = []
  let customIconsUsed = []
  let lucideIconsUsed = []

  // æ‰¾åˆ°å¯¼å…¥è¡Œï¼ˆå¯èƒ½è·¨å¤šè¡Œï¼‰
  let inImport = false
  let importBuffer = ''

  for (let i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
    const line = lines[i]

    if (line.includes("from '~/components/icons'") || line.includes('from "~/components/icons"')) {
      // å•è¡Œå¯¼å…¥
      if (line.includes('import')) {
        importLineStart = i
        importLineEnd = i
        importBuffer = line
        hasIconImport = true
        break
      } else {
        // å¤šè¡Œå¯¼å…¥çš„æœ€åä¸€è¡Œ
        importLineEnd = i
        importBuffer += '\n' + line
        hasIconImport = true
        break
      }
    } else if (line.match(/^\s*import\s*\{/) && !line.includes('from')) {
      // å¯èƒ½æ˜¯å¤šè¡Œå¯¼å…¥çš„å¼€å§‹
      inImport = true
      importLineStart = i
      importBuffer = line
    } else if (inImport) {
      importBuffer += '\n' + line
      if (line.includes('from')) {
        if (line.includes("~/components/icons")) {
          importLineEnd = i
          hasIconImport = true
        }
        inImport = false
        break
      }
    }
  }

  if (!hasIconImport) {
    return { changed: false }
  }

  // è§£æå¯¼å…¥çš„å›¾æ ‡
  const parsed = parseImportLine(importBuffer.replace(/\n/g, ' '))
  if (!parsed) {
    console.log(`  æ— æ³•è§£æå¯¼å…¥: ${filePath}`)
    return { changed: false }
  }

  // åˆ†ç±»å›¾æ ‡
  for (const icon of parsed) {
    if (CUSTOM_SVG_ICONS[icon.original]) {
      customIconsUsed.push(icon)
    } else if (ICON_MAPPING[icon.original]) {
      lucideIconsUsed.push({
        ...icon,
        lucideName: ICON_MAPPING[icon.original],
      })
    } else {
      console.log(`  æœªçŸ¥å›¾æ ‡: ${icon.original} in ${filePath}`)
    }
  }

  // ç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„å¯¼å…¥è¯­å¥
  const newImports = []

  // lucide å¯¼å…¥
  if (lucideIconsUsed.length > 0) {
    const lucideImports = lucideIconsUsed.map((icon) => {
      const alias = icon.alias || icon.original
      if (icon.lucideName === alias) {
        return icon.lucideName
      } else {
        return `${icon.lucideName} as ${alias}`
      }
    })
    newImports.push(`import { ${lucideImports.join(', ')} } from 'lucide-vue-next'`)
  }

  // è‡ªå®šä¹‰ SVG å›¾æ ‡å†…è”
  if (customIconsUsed.length > 0) {
    for (const icon of customIconsUsed) {
      const alias = icon.alias || icon.original
      newImports.push(`const ${alias} = ${CUSTOM_SVG_ICONS[icon.original]}`)
    }
  }

  // æ›¿æ¢å¯¼å…¥è¡Œ
  const newLines = [
    ...lines.slice(0, importLineStart),
    ...newImports,
    ...lines.slice(importLineEnd + 1),
  ]

  const newContent = newLines.join('\n')

  if (newContent !== content) {
    writeFileSync(filePath, newContent)
    return {
      changed: true,
      lucideIcons: lucideIconsUsed.map((i) => i.lucideName),
      customIcons: customIconsUsed.map((i) => i.original),
    }
  }

  return { changed: false }
}

// ä¸»å‡½æ•°
function main() {
  const srcDir = join(process.cwd(), 'src')
  const files = getAllFiles(srcDir)

  console.log(`æ‰¾åˆ° ${files.length} ä¸ªæºæ–‡ä»¶`)

  let changedCount = 0
  const results = []

  for (const file of files) {
    // è·³è¿‡ icons/index.tsx æœ¬èº«
    if (file.includes('components/icons/index.tsx')) continue

    const result = processFile(file)
    if (result.changed) {
      changedCount++
      const relPath = relative(process.cwd(), file)
      console.log(`âœ“ ${relPath}`)
      results.push({ file: relPath, ...result })
    }
  }

  console.log(`\nå®Œæˆ! ä¿®æ”¹äº† ${changedCount} ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶`)

  if (results.length > 0) {
    console.log('\nä¿®æ”¹æ‘˜è¦:')
    for (const r of results) {
      console.log(`  ${r.file}:`)
      if (r.lucideIcons?.length) console.log(`    Lucide: ${r.lucideIcons.join(', ')}`)
      if (r.customIcons?.length) console.log(`    Custom: ${r.customIcons.join(', ')}`)
    }
  }
}

main()

```

```mjs
// è‡ªå®šä¹‰ SVG å›¾æ ‡ï¼ˆéœ€è¦å†…è”ï¼‰
const CUSTOM_SVG_ICONS = {

// æ”¶é›†æ‰€æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶
function getAllFiles(dir, ext = '.tsx') {
  const files = []
  const items = readdirSync(dir)

  for (const item of items) {
    const fullPath = join(dir, item)
    const stat = statSync(fullPath)

    if (stat.isDirectory() && !item.startsWith('.') && item !== 'node_modules') {
      files.push(...getAllFiles(fullPath, ext))
    } else if (item.endsWith(ext) || item.endsWith('.ts') || item.endsWith('.vue')) {
      files.push(fullPath)
    }
  }

  return files
}

// å¤„ç†å•ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶
function processFile(filePath) {
  const content = readFileSync(filePath, 'utf-8')

  // åŒ¹é…å¤šè¡Œå¯¼å…¥è¯­å¥: import { ... } from '~/components/icons'
  const importRegex = /import\s*\{([^}]+)\}\s*from\s*['"]~\/components\/icons['"]/gs

  const match = importRegex.exec(content)
  if (!match) {
    return { changed: false }
  }

  const fullMatch = match[0]
  const importList = match[1]

  // è§£æå¯¼å…¥çš„å›¾æ ‡
  const imports = importList
    .replace(/\n/g, ' ')
    .split(',')
    .map((s) => s.trim())
    .filter(Boolean)
    .map((imp) => {
      const asMatch = imp.match(/^(\w+)\s+as\s+(\w+)$/)
      if (asMatch) {
        return { original: asMatch[1], alias: asMatch[2] }
      }
      return { original: imp, alias: null }
    })

  const customIconsUsed = []
  const lucideIconsUsed = []

  for (const icon of imports) {
    if (CUSTOM_SVG_ICONS[icon.original]) {
      customIconsUsed.push(icon)
    } else if (ICON_MAPPING[icon.original]) {
      lucideIconsUsed.push({
        ...icon,
        lucideName: ICON_MAPPING[icon.original],
      })
    } else {
      console.log(`  æœªçŸ¥å›¾æ ‡: ${icon.original} in ${filePath}`)
    }
  }

  // ç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„å¯¼å…¥è¯­å¥
  const newImports = []

  // lucide å¯¼å…¥
  if (lucideIconsUsed.length > 0) {
    const lucideImports = lucideIconsUsed.map((icon) => {
      const alias = icon.alias || icon.original
      if (icon.lucideName === alias) {
        return icon.lucideName
      } else {
        return `${icon.lucideName} as ${alias}`
      }
    })
    newImports.push(`import { ${lucideImports.join(', ')} } from 'lucide-vue-next'`)
  }

  // è‡ªå®šä¹‰ SVG å›¾æ ‡å†…è”
  if (customIconsUsed.length > 0) {
    for (const icon of customIconsUsed) {
      const alias = icon.alias || icon.original
      newImports.push(`const ${alias} = ${CUSTOM_SVG_ICONS[icon.original]}`)
    }
  }

  // æ›¿æ¢å¯¼å…¥
  const newContent = content.replace(fullMatch, newImports.join('\n'))

  if (newContent !== content) {
    writeFileSync(filePath, newContent)
    return {
      changed: true,
      lucideIcons: lucideIconsUsed.map((i) => i.lucideName),
      customIcons: customIconsUsed.map((i) => i.original),
    }
  }

  return { changed: false }
}

// ä¸»å‡½æ•°
function main() {
  const srcDir = join(process.cwd(), 'src')
  const files = getAllFiles(srcDir)

  console.log(`æ‰¾åˆ° ${files.length} ä¸ªæºæ–‡ä»¶`)

  let changedCount = 0
  const results = []

  for (const file of files) {
    // è·³è¿‡ icons/index.tsx æœ¬èº«
    if (file.includes('components/icons/index.tsx')) continue

    const result = processFile(file)
    if (result.changed) {
      changedCount++
      const relPath = relative(process.cwd(), file)
      console.log(`âœ“ ${relPath}`)
      results.push({ file: relPath, ...result })
    }
  }

  console.log(`\nå®Œæˆ! ä¿®æ”¹äº† ${changedCount} ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶`)

  if (results.length > 0) {
    console.log('\nä¿®æ”¹æ‘˜è¦:')
    for (const r of results) {
      console.log(`  ${r.file}:`)
      if (r.lucideIcons?.length) console.log(`    Lucide: ${r.lucideIcons.join(', ')}`)
      if (r.customIcons?.length) console.log(`    Custom: ${r.customIcons.join(', ')}`)
    }
  }
}

main()
```

```
   204â†’// æ”¶é›†æ‰€æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶
   205â†’function getAllFiles(dir, ext = '.tsx') {
   206â†’  const files = []
   207â†’  const items = readdirSync(dir)
   208â†’
   209â†’  for (const item of items) {
   210â†’    const fullPath = join(dir, item)
   211â†’    const stat = statSync(fullPath)
   212â†’
   213â†’    if (stat.isDirectory() && !item.startsWith('.') && item !== 'node_modules') {
   214â†’      files.push(...getAllFiles(fullPath, ext))
   215â†’    } else if (item.endsWith(ext) || item.endsWith('.ts') || item.endsWith('.vue')) {
   216â†’      files.push(fullPath)
   217â†’    }
   218â†’  }
   219â†’
   220â†’  return files
   221â†’}
   222â†’
   223â†’// å¤„ç†å•ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶
   224â†’function processFile(filePath) {
   225â†’  const content = readFileSync(filePath, 'utf-8')
   226â†’
   227â†’  // åŒ¹é…å¤šè¡Œå¯¼å…¥è¯­å¥: import { ... } from '~/components/icons'
   228â†’  const importRegex = /import\s*\{([^}]+)\}\s*from\s*['"]~\/components\/icons['"]/gs
   229â†’
   230â†’  const match = importRegex.exec(content)
   231â†’  if (!match) {
   232â†’    return { changed: false }
   233â†’  }
   234â†’
   235â†’  const fullMatch = match[0]
   236â†’  const importList = match[1]
   237â†’
   238â†’  // è§£æå¯¼å…¥çš„å›¾æ ‡
   239â†’  const imports = importList
   240â†’    .replace(/\n/g, ' ')
   241â†’    .split(',')
   242â†’    .map((s) => s.trim())
   243â†’    .filter(Boolean)
   244â†’    .map((imp) => {
   245â†’      const asMatch = imp.match(/^(\w+)\s+as\s+(\w+)$/)
   246â†’      if (asMatch) {
   247â†’        return { original: asMatch[1], alias: asMatch[2] }
   248â†’      }
   249â†’      return { original: imp, alias: null }
   250â†’    })
   251â†’
   252â†’  const customIconsUsed = []
   253â†’  const lucideIconsUsed = []
   254â†’
   255â†’  for (const icon of imports) {
   256â†’    if (CUSTOM_SVG_ICONS[icon.original]) {
   257â†’      customIconsUsed.push(icon)
   258â†’    } else if (ICON_MAPPING[icon.original]) {
   259â†’      lucideIconsUsed.push({
   260â†’        ...icon,
   261â†’        lucideName: ICON_MAPPING[icon.original],
   262â†’      })
   263â†’    } else {
   264â†’      console.log(`  æœªçŸ¥å›¾æ ‡: ${icon.original} in ${filePath}`)
   265â†’    }
   266â†’  }
   267â†’
   268â†’  // ç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„å¯¼å…¥è¯­å¥
   269â†’  const newImports = []
   270â†’
   271â†’  // lucide å¯¼å…¥
   272â†’  if (lucideIconsUsed.length > 0) {
   273â†’    const lucideImports = lucideIconsUsed.map((icon) => {
   274â†’      const alias = icon.alias || icon.original
   275â†’      if (icon.lucideName === alias) {
   276â†’        return icon.lucideName
   277â†’      } else {
   278â†’        return `${icon.lucideName} as ${alias}`
   279â†’      }
   280â†’    })
   281â†’    newImports.push(`import { ${lucideImports.join(', ')} } from 'lucide-vue-next'`)
   282â†’  }
   283â†’
   284â†’  // è‡ªå®šä¹‰ SVG å›¾æ ‡å†…è”
   285â†’  if (customIconsUsed.length > 0) {
   286â†’    for (const icon of customIconsUsed) {
   287â†’      const alias = icon.alias || icon.original
   288â†’      newImports.push(`const ${alias} = ${CUSTOM_SVG_ICONS[icon.original]}`)
   289â†’    }
   290â†’  }
   291â†’
   292â†’  // æ›¿æ¢å¯¼å…¥
   293â†’  const newContent = content.replace(fullMatch, newImports.join('\n'))
   294â†’
   295â†’  if (newContent !== content) {
   296â†’    writeFileSync(filePath, newContent)
   297â†’    return {
   298â†’      changed: true,
   299â†’      lucideIcons: lucideIconsUsed.map((i) => i.lucideName),
   300â†’      customIcons: customIconsUsed.map((i) => i.original),
   301â†’    }
   302â†’  }
   303â†’
   304â†’  return { changed: false }
   305â†’}
   306â†’
   307â†’// ä¸»å‡½æ•°
   308â†’function main() {
   309â†’  const srcDir = join(process.cwd(), 'src')
   310â†’  const files = getAllFiles(srcDir)
   311â†’
   312â†’  console.log(`æ‰¾åˆ° ${files.length} ä¸ªæºæ–‡ä»¶`)
   313â†’
   314â†’  let changedCount = 0
   315â†’  const results = []
   316â†’
   317â†’  for (const file of files) {
   318â†’    // è·³è¿‡ icons/index.tsx æœ¬èº«
   319â†’    if (file.includes('components/icons/index.tsx')) continue
   320â†’
   321â†’    const result = processFile(file)
   322â†’    if (result.changed) {
   323â†’      changedCount++
   324â†’      const relPath = relative(process.cwd(), file)
   325â†’      console.log(`âœ“ ${relPath}`)
   326â†’      results.push({ file: relPath, ...result })
   327â†’    }
   328â†’  }
   329â†’
   330â†’  console.log(`\nå®Œæˆ! ä¿®æ”¹äº† ${changedCount} ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶`)
   331â†’
   332â†’  if (results.length > 0) {
   333â†’    console.log('\nä¿®æ”¹æ‘˜è¦:')
   334â†’    for (const r of results) {
   335â†’      console.log(`  ${r.file}:`)
   336â†’      if (r.lucideIcons?.length) console.log(`    Lucide: ${r.lucideIcons.join(', ')}`)
   337â†’      if (r.customIcons?.length) console.log(`    Custom: ${r.customIcons.join(', ')}`)
   338â†’    }
   339â†’  }
   340â†’}
   341â†’
   342â†’main()
```
